price: 14. En goed voor zijn ouders en hij was noch arrogant noch ongehoorzaam.
arabic: وَبَرَّۢا بِوَٰلِدَيۡهِ وَلَمۡ يَكُن جَبَّارًا عَصِيّٗا

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wabarran biwālidayhi walam yakun jabbāran ʿaṣiyyan
